exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.description: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides, then jump to a position with legs spread and arms overhead.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: Begin in a squat position, jump into a plank, do a push-up, jump your feet back to squat, and jump up.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: In a plank position, drive your knees toward your chest, alternating legs quickly.

exercises.name: Hundred
exercises.description: Lie on your back, lift your legs and arms, and pulse your arms up and down while inhaling and exhaling for a count of five.

exercises.name: Single Leg Stretch
exercises.description: Lie on your back, bring one knee toward your chest while the other leg extends out, and switch legs in a smooth motion.

exercises.name: Roll Up
exercises.description: Lie flat, reach your arms overhead, and slowly roll up one vertebra at a time to a sitting position.

exercises.name: Slow Pace
exercises.description: Slow your pace to a walk or slow jog. This is your recovery period.

exercises.name: Jog
exercises.description: Run at a comfortable pace. Your should feel your heartbeat slowly increase.

exercises.name: Sprint
exercises.description: Run as fast as you can.
